fields.summary: wireframe full-width container and move help on all resource detail pages

issuetype.description: A user story. Created by JIRA Software - do not edit or delete.
issuetype.name: Story

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: as a console user, I want the full width of my screen taken up by widgetry instead of help taking up so much room, since it's rarely used.
fields.summary: make main container full-width and move help expando to bottom of page on all detail pages

comments.body: The GUI-1634 branch contains the changes. We may need further changes after seeing full-width. Let's chat.

Great first pass, some issues as expected:

instance page: 
* key/value pairs are indented way too far (done)
* tag editor text entry fields are spaced too far apart, but don't fix that here because i've got another ticket open to make other tag editor improvements

stack page:
* content extends down beyond container on all tabs (check this once 1489 is merged, be sure this works)

scaling group page:
* key/value pairs are indented too far (done)
* min/desired/max widgets also need to be left-aligned (done)

EIP page:
* key/value pairs are indented too far (done)

volumes page:
* key/value pairs are indented too far (done)

snapshots page:
* key/value pairs are indented too far (done)

bucket page:
* key/value pairs are indented too far (done)

object page:
* key/value pairs are indented too far (done) 
* including on metadata and sharing editors (metadata done, sharing, not enough space, made perms a chosen though)

security group page:
* key/value pairs are indented too far (ignore rules panel, i'll write a separate ticket against that) (done)

key pair page:
* key/value pairs are indented too far (done)

IAM users page:
* key/value pairs are indented too far (done)
* create new password OR line should be moved to the left to remove the existing excess whitespace (done)
* OR text is not centered in circle (done)
* too much whitespace between text and "add Access Policy" button, and text and "Generate Random Password" button (match whitespace in access key section as example) (done)
* access policies delete, edit, name spaced too far apart (also true on groups and roles pages) (done)

IAM groups page:
* key/value pairs are indented too far (done)

roles page:
* key/value pairs are indented too far (done)
* multiple instances in value list not indenting properly (done)
* trusted entities k/v pair indented too far, and should not have a colon in label (done)

launch more instances like this:
* how many widget should be left aligned (let's talk about this)
* k/v pairs are indented too far (including in advanced area) (done)
* user data area: labels and radio buttons have too much whitespace between them (done)
* BDM table should expand to full width (done, but look at d-o-t checkbox alignment)
* add another device: size label is not stacked, appears to the left of widget (done)

create image:
* same k/v indentation issues (done)
* same BDM issues (done)
* tag editor issues will be fixed under separate ticket
* too much whitespace between no reboot and help bubble (done)

create volume:
* k/v indentation issues (done)
* not enough whitespace between create from snap and volume size widgets (looks good now)
* not enough whitespace between size widget and AZ text block (done)
* too much whitespace between az text block and az select widget (done)

create snap:
* key/value pairs are indented too far (done)
* create button is not title case (done)

create security group:
* key/value pairs are indented too far (done)
* rules editor issues will be fixed under a separate ticket

create key pair and import public key:
* key/value pairs are indented too far (done)

create users page:
* key/value pairs are indented too far in advanced section (2/10, consistent with all others, but by itself looks too far, changing to 1/11)
* also, label in add a user section should be outside the widget, not inline (done)

account detail page:
* k/v indentation (done)
* content extends down outside border of container at bottom (both tabs) (done)

addressed every item. comments next to each above:

https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pull/1351
started review, saw this on very first page I looked at (instance details), stopped review. Please check all work *before* resubmitting. Screenshot attached.
AH! That's because image detail page wasn't on the list! We both missed it 1st time through!
image view updated, GUI-1634 branch

* scaling group page still not right, see screenshot. (if you're talking about the min/max/desired labels, I think that's something more general Kamal was going to deal with as fallout from Foundation update)
* launch config page needs indentation work too (done)
* account detail, those are all short labels, they can't come in any more than that? (yes, was just being consistent... moved more)

create volume
* whitespace in volume section still needs ooching...I'd like a little more between size and the text block, and a little more between the text block and AZ, they still need a little breathing room (done)

import key: I would prefer the labels not wrap whenever possible, if you can ooch that one back over so the label doesn't wrap, please (notice they never wrap in the wireframes) (done)
launch more instances like this:
* how many should not wrap, that one needs more columns (done)
* name(s) is lacking parens around the S and is not right aligned like the other labels (done)
* is here not enough room for RAMFS label not to wrap? It looks like there should be... (yes, but some padding applied to all stuff keeps this from fitting. I can override this one only)
* yeah, DOT checkbox should be centered under the column header please. (checkbox centered, label is what's left.. will adjust)
updated branch.

* still a mistake on the scaling group page general tab not related to foundation (slow down and you'll see it)
* 
fix that and i'll review the rest of the branch

Great job! Almost there:

Create volume, I noticed the create from snap label wraps, can you add a column back tot he left side so that doesn't wrap, please? We should try and not have labels wrap as much as possible. Sorry I missed that on last review.
UX review passed, ready for code review
Punting back to make fixes noted in PR code review comments.
fixed most concerns, comments added in PR.
Punting back to remove br tags
GUI-1634 branch has updates to wizards. They were looking pretty nasty.
re-checked UX on wizards and everything looks awesome. Passing back to Kamal for code check.
[~dkavanagh]: PR 1351 needs a few fixes, and feel free to reopen the PR when it's ready for code review again.

Kamal, the things you mentioned were done yesterday in this commit https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/commit/ec7e7aee112b89189ec196ccebf91a43142ffa14
The PR looks to be open still and has passed tests.
https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pull/1366
PR 1366 merged

Verified.  Help is now at the bottom of each detail page.
